items.title: ‘A Martyr For The Christian Faith’: Attendees Highlight Charlie Kirk’s Legacy Of Faith At Packed Kennedy Center Vigil
items.description: 'Charlie touched a generation,' one attendee told The Federalist, 'he activated them.'

items.title: Getting Fired For Celebrating Kirk’s Assassination Is Not Cancel Culture, It’s Accountability
items.description: Celebrating the brutal murder of a civilian lacks morals and requires far more accountability than mere ‘cancel culture’ can afford.
